headline: Bring civic planning to life for modern digital audiences
campaignDescription: The MTC’s far-reaching mission includes not just planning for the Bay Area’s future, but engaging the community in the planning process—a task that’s complicated in our modern era; detailed planning proposals seldom fit neatly within a tweet. C&C partnered with the MTC on a journey to bring the organization’s work to life for digital audiences, creating thoughtful short form content, implementing a best-in-class social presence, understanding the needs of Bay Area stakeholders, and engaging diverse communities in the organization’s 2050 vision, including Millennial and Gen Z residents, embracing platforms such as Snapchat, Instagram, Spotify, and YouTube in doing so.
mainTakeaway: Digital ads drove 98% of game traffic
supportiveText: MTC received 10,000+ inputs to PBA 2050 from 3,000+ game players
yellowBoxContent: Snapchat, Facebook and IG stories gave us a platform to hook residents on the challenge of playing the game.

carousel.body: Our messenger chatbot was a popular tool that also helped verify that citizens were getting the info relevant to them, and that they had intentions to begin or get better about their recycling habits.
